column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=On last Sunday morning my wife woke me up and told me its 11 o'clock and time to to get up .
#text=But I was very lazy on that day and I want to spend some more time on bed .
#text=I asked my wife to get me some coffee .
#text=She brought a very tasty hot coffee .
#text=Its aroma is spreading everywhere in my room .
#text=After having the coffee I got up and took a good shower .
#text=That time my wife prepared breakfast for me .
#text=So I had my breakfast and spent some time for reading news online .
#text=Then My wife came to me and asked what is my plan for our son 's birthday .
#text=At last I reached a conclusion that this time I cook food by myself .
#text=So we need to make a list for groceries for that .
#text=My wife helped me to prepare a list .
#text=At last I found good deals in a grocery shop near my house .
#text=So me and my son went to the shop .
#text=My son likes grocery shopping very much .
#text=When we reached the grocery shop , I asked my son to sit in the cart .
#text=While we were moving inside the shop , I felt happy by seeing the deals of the day .
#text=Most of the groceries in my list are on sale .
#text=I bought almost everything in my list .
#text=I saved a lot on that day because of the deal .
#text=After paying the bill , we went out of the shop and kept everything inside the car and left to home .
